author: USA TODAY, Letitia Stein and Brett Murphy, USA TODAY
title: Trump wants to reopen America in a few weeks. In internal documents, federal health officials warn the bar to do so safely may be too high.
description: In internal documents, the health agency says that re-opening America will require massive capacity to test, track and treat people for coronavirus.
content:
Federal health officials warned leaders on the White Houses coronavirus task force this week that reopening the nation will require a massive capacity to test, track and treat people for the ongoing threat of the new coronavirus. 
Their guidance contradicts … [+15033 chars]
